item.description:
Understanding the nature of the 3 subtype areas is as important, if not more important, than the Enneagram type. For Sexual (Relationship) subtypes as well as anyone in relationship to one or just curious about this dominant subtype.

Learn more about Sexual (Relationship) Subtypes, what's important to them and how to relate to Sexual Subtypes in general and well as how they tend to relate to the other two dominant subtypes.. Valuable for Sexual Subtypes as well as those in relationship to Sexual Subtypes. Option to end at 9:30pm.

 

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling is an Enneagram teacher/trainer/counselor/expert. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and also Herb's Tips for Living (a book of wisdom on how to live a happy and balanced life). Both books available from him. He trains teams in organizations to work together effectively with personality differences, as well as counsels individuals, couples and families to relate well with their differences.

www.herbpearce.com

781 648 3737

herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.why: You want to understand people and have better relationships!
item.name: Sexual (Relationship) Subtypes in the Enneagram
